content.rendered:
Acceptance of the Use of Unified Infotech

By availing any services from Unified Infotech, you’re acknowledging the terms and conditions provided by us. Any of these services are subject to follow these terms and conditions strictly. If you are availing services from Unified Infotech, that signifies the agreement with the disclaimers, terms, and conditions provided by our company. You will not utilize Unified Infotech’s service for any purpose which is illegal or forbidden by any terms and conditions.

Credit Card Details

You are requested not to provide any of your Credit Card details on any type with Unified Infotech as we will never approach you for Credit Card details. In the event that you discover any form, documentation or payment that requires your Credit Card details, contact Unified Infotech before you proceed.

Advice

The content posted by Unified Infotech website does not establish any opinion and should not support in making and refusing any decision that you make. Any content from Unified Infotech is purely based on the current standard.

Change of Use

Unified Infotech reserves the right to:

We adjust, modify or eliminate anything from its website anytime without any prior notice. What’s more, by accepting these terms and condition you’re affirming that Unified Infotech will neither be at risk for any progressions done in its webpage, nor it needs to educate about any adjustment to its website.

Modify the terms and conditions whenever with no prior notice. What’s more, the proceeding with the utilization of your site after the alteration will pass on your acceptance of the changes made.

excerpt.rendered: Acceptance of the Use of Unified Infotech By availing any services from Unified Infotech, you’re acknowledging the terms and conditions
